channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Japan is planning the biggest minimum wage hike since it set a pay floor in 1978
item.description: Higher minimum wages will likely particularly benefit low-income households, which are most affected by ongoing inflation.

item.title: Philippines battles to contain oil spill as tanker sinks, leaving one dead
item.description: A tanker carrying 1.4 million liters of industrial fuel sank off the coast of Philippines, leading to one casualty and a vast oil spill.

item.title: Southwest Airlines to change to assigned seating and premium seating options
Rupert Murdoch is going to court to push his 3 more liberal kids out of his Fox and News Corp media empires
item.description: Court documents show Murdoch wants to give more voting rights to his conservative son, and CEO of Fox, Lachlan.

item.title: Southwest profit falls 46% as airline takes 'urgent' steps to increase revenue
item.description: Southwest is under pressure from an activist investor after it lagged competitors.

item.title: Gucci owner Kering downgraded by UBS as stock price sputters
Nestle ‘still in repairing mode’ warns CEO Mark Schneider, as Swiss giant lowers sales outlook and seeks to lure cost-conscious customers back
item.description: Nestle could face pressure to cut costs more aggressively and consider whether acquisitions or disposals are needed to drive profitability.

item.title: Southwest to get rid of open seating, offer extra legroom in biggest shift in its history
item.description: Southwest is under pressure to drum up revenue from an oversupplied U.S. market and an activist investor.

item.title: Ackman holding Universal Music sees stock-price nosedive of 28%
Wells Fargo won’t renew the Philadelphia sports arena naming deal it’s had since 2010
item.description: Neither team that uses the arena—the 76ers and the Flyers—has won a championship in over 40 years.

item.title: Thursday's analyst calls: Amazon to jump more than 25%, Apple price target increase
item.description: Two tech names were top of minds for analysts on Thursday.

item.title: Lineage raises $4.4 billion in year’s largest IPO to date
Stellantis profits halve amid massive drop in sales as carmaker reveals plans to revive old models
item.description: Net income fell 48% to €5.6 billion in the first half, missing the €7 billion average estimate.

item.title: Coinbase UK unit fined $4.5 million by British regulator over 'high-risk' customer breaches
item.description: U.K. regulators fined Coinbase's U.K. arm £3.5 million ($4.5 million) on Thursday over breaches of a voluntary agreement designed to stop the cryptocurrency exchange onboarding "high-risk customers.

item.title: Biden says he’ll keep fighting to lower costs as he passes the torch
